ProductInfo.Features:
GW9732: 32 Channel H.264 960H Realtime DVR With HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30fps Recording. D1 Mode/960H Mode & 30fps Playback. iPhone, Android Viewing. New Color Graphical Menu. Network Live, Backup, Playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW736CB: 1/3" HDIS CCD Outdoor or Indoor Camera, 700 TV Lines, 3.6mm Lens, 24 IR LEDs, 65 ft. IR Distance. 0.001 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal Vandal Proof & Water Proof
Package Includes: 32 channel DVR with 6T HD Free 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor 32x1/3" HDIS CCD Camera 1x1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable 2x10A,18 ports power box 32xPower pigtail 32xPower pigtail 64xTwist On BNC Male Connector
Package Includes: 32 channel DVR with 6T HD Free 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor, 32x1/3" HDIS CCD Camera, 1x1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable, 2x10A,18 ports power box, 32xPower pigtail, 32xPower pigtail, 64xTwist On BNC Male Connector
